price: Dájúdájú Àwa máa gbé ìyà náà kúrò fún ìgbà díẹ̀. Dájúdájú ẹ̀yin yóò tún padà (sínú àìgbàgbọ́).
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
